entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
